About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Welcome to my portfolio website! My name is Chad. I'm a computer geek, eSports enthusiast (go Cloud9!), and I claim to know my way around a guitar. Phoenix, Arizona is my permanent home as of 2015, and I'm still enjoying exploring the beautiful state. I live with my wonderful girlfriend and our two spoiled cats.

I'm a certified full stack web developer through the University of Arizona Coding Boot Camp, and continue to learn every day. I enjoy the process of problem solving that goes along with programming, and make it my mission to deliver clean and adaptable code.

Here's what I know...
